column4: Hi, I've gotta somewhat silly question.  I'm compiling some software from source, and am not sure where the best place to put it is.  Ordinarily I'd assume /usr/local, but it looks like apt has already added some (python related) stuff there.  Do ubuntu users prefer /opt?  Somewhere else?
normally source can be compiled and run from the ~ directory
It's not a python program.  It's a new build of Coq (coq.infria.fr).
